suite.name: Login Orange

test.name: Cenário 01: Realizar Login com usuario e senha válidos

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (123.0.6312.122) detected in PATH at C:\Users\Proprietario\Documents\drivers\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (124.0.6367.208); currently, chromedriver 124.0.6367.207 is recommended for chrome 124.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Dado que estou na tela de login do site OrangeHRM
Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

suite.doc: Esta suite tem como finalidade realizar testes de login no site https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login
